snippet: The language does more than inform voters that the measure will change the State Constitution; it promises job growth, more school aid and lower property taxes.
abstract: New York State ballot measure to expand full-scale casino gambling does more than inform voters that measure would change State Constitution to authorize up to seven casinos; with distinctly positive slant, ballot language tells voters that measure would promote job growth, increase aid to schools and permit local governments to lower property taxes.
lead_paragraph: The language does more than inform voters that the measure will change the State Constitution; it promises job growth, more school aid and lower property taxes.

headline.main: Ballot Measure on Casinos Will Have a Positive Slant
